title: Scrum Studio
description: Scrum Studio is a protected space that enables agile teams to innovate by working free from traditional organisational constraints.

title: Agility Path
description: Agility Path is a Scrum.org framework that uses Evidence-Based Management to improve organisational value delivery through outcome-focused, empirical change.

title: Evidence-based Management Consultant
description: The Evidence-Based Management Consultant was a Scrum.org expert who helped organisations improve value delivery through outcome-focused, empirical change.
